comments:
We started seeing the following stack trace when we started exercising the listener facility of the FacetsSelectionPage. The problem was that the list of listeners is not copied prior to calling out to listeners. This creates a problem when a code path invoked by a listener causes a listener to be removed, since the list size is changed. The fix is to simply copy the list and loop over the copy. I will attach the patch if anyone wants to review. We need to fix this in 1.5.3.
